title: Memory Echo
code:
§begin remember
  memories ← ["first", "light", "home", "stars", "end", "hope"]
  preserved ← 0
  §iterate memory §in memories
    preserved ← preserved ⊕ 1
    §transmit memory
  §end_iterate
  §transmit preserved
§end
expected_output:
first
light
home
stars
end
hope
6
solution_description: preserves and counts memories, representing the act of remembering
hints: Each memory is preserved (counted and output)
Six memories: first light, home, stars, end, hope
This represents the act of remembering itself
